Class ListUI

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
ICoreConstants, IUIConstants, java.awt.datatransfer.ClipboardOwner, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener
public class ListUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicTableUI
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, ICoreConstants, IUIConstants, java.awt.datatransfer.ClipboardOwner

openNode

private void openNode(NodeSummary oNode)
Open this node depending on type. If a map/list node, open the view. If a reference node, open any associated reference in an external application. If any other node, open the ContentDialog for this node.

oNode - the node to open.

public void onSelectAll()
Selects all the objects on the list.

isCopyToClipboard

public boolean isCopyToClipboard()
Return if a copy to the Clipbaord is currently underway.

Returns:
boolean, true is a copy is underway, else false.

isCutToClipboard

public boolean isCutToClipboard()
Return if a cut to the Clipbaord is currently underway.

Returns:
boolean, true is a cut is underway, else false.

externalCopyToClipboard

public void externalCopyToClipboard()
This method copies the selected nodes to the clipboard and also stores all view children for potential subsequent pasting into another database.

copyToClipboard

public void copyToClipboard()
This method copies the selected nodes to the clipboard.

cutToClipboard

public void cutToClipboard()
This method cuts the selected nodes to the clipboard, and deletes them from the list.

pasteFromClipboard

public void pasteFromClipboard()
This routine gets the clipboard contents, and paste it into this list.

externalPasteFromClipboard

public void externalPasteFromClipboard()
This routine gets the clipboard contents and paste them into the list as an external paste.

Parameters:
doSmartImport, - setting for Questmap or XML imports to use.

                            boolean includeInDetail)
For Importing XML files.

Parameters:
filename, - the name of the file to import.
includeInDetail, - whether to include the original author and dates in the node detail.

createNode

public NodePosition createNode(java.lang.String sNodeID,
                               int nodeType,
                               java.lang.String sOriginalID,
                               java.lang.String author,
                               java.lang.String label,
                               java.lang.String detail,
                               int x,
                               int y)
Creates a new node from the passed parameters.

Parameters:
sNodeID, - the id to give this node.
nodeType, - the type of the new node.
sOriginalID, - the original id of this node.
author, - the author of this node.
label, - the label for this node.
detail, - the main detail page for this node.
x, - the x position to place this node at in this view.
y, - the y position, or row to place this node at in this view.
Returns:
com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodePosition, the newly create node.

                               int x,

label, - the label for this node.
detail, - the main detail page for this node.
x, - the x position to place this node at - not really used here - Always zero.
y, - the y position, or row to place this node at in the list.

com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodePosition, the newly create node.

createNode

public NodePosition createNode(int nodeType,
                               java.lang.String importedId,
                               java.lang.String sOriginalID,
                               java.lang.String author,
                               java.util.Date creationDate,
                               java.util.Date modDate,
                               java.lang.String label,
                               java.lang.String detail,
                               int x,
                               int y,
                               java.util.Date transCreationDate,
                               java.util.Date transModDate)
Creates a new node from the passed parameters.

Parameters:
nodeType, - the type of the new node.
importedId, - the id the node had when imported.
sOriginalID, - the original id of this node.
author, - the author of this node.
creationDate, - the date the node was created.
modDate, - the date the node was last modified.
label, - the label for this node.
detail, - the main detail page for this node.
x, - the x position to place this node at - not really used here - Always zero.
y, - the y position, or row to place this node at in the list.
transCreationDate, - the date the node was put into the view.
transModDate, - the date the view-node data was last modified.
sLastModAuthor - the author who last modified this node.
Returns:
com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodePosition, the newly create node.

createNode

public NodePosition createNode(int nodeType,
                               java.lang.String importedId,
                               java.lang.String sOriginalID,
                               java.lang.String author,
                               java.util.Date creationDate,
                               java.util.Date modDate,
                               java.lang.String label,
                               java.lang.String detail,
                               int x,
                               int y,
                               java.util.Date transCreationDate,
                               java.util.Date transModDate,
                               java.lang.String sLastModAuthor,
                               boolean bShowTags,
                               boolean bShowText,
                               boolean bShowTrans,
                               boolean bShowWeight,
                               boolean bSmallIcon,
                               boolean bHideIcon,
                               int nWrapWidth,
                               int nFontSize,
                               java.lang.String sFontFace,
                               int nFontStyle,
                               int nForeground,
                               int nBackground)
Creates a new node from the passed parameters.

Parameters:
nodeType - the type of the new node.
importedId - the id the node had when imported.
sOriginalID - the original id of this node.
author - the author of this node.
creationDate - the date the node was created.
modDate - the date the node was last modified.
label - the label for this node.
detail - the main detail page for this node.
x - the x position to place this node at - not really used here - Always zero.
y - the y position or row to place this node at in the list.
transCreationDate - the date the node was put into the view.
transModDate - the date the view-node data was last modified.
sLastModAuthor - the author who last modified this node.
bShowTags - true if this node has the tags indicator draw.
bShowText - true if this node has the text indicator drawn
bShowTrans - true if this node has the transclusion indicator drawn
bShowWeight - true if this node has the weight indicator displayed
bSmallIcon - true if this node is using a small icon
bHideIcons - true if this node is not displaying its icon
nWrapWidth - the node label wrap width used for this node in this view.
nFontSize - the font size used for this node in this view
sFontFace - the font face used for this node in this view
nFontStyle - the font style used for this node in this view
nForeground - the foreground color used for this node in this view
nBackground - the background color used for this node in this view.
Returns:
com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodePosition, the newly create node.
